page.title: 06FARMIMG.
page.content: Fladbury is situated in the centre of a market gardening area.A typical utilization of a small holding of approximately 21 acres is anticipated as:1 acre of both radish and lettuce planted in February:5 acres of spring onions growing from January till August:2 acres of leeks and 1 acre of summer cabbage planted in March:3 acres of winter cabbage,savoy,red cabbage,kale,and cauliflower planted in April:0.5 acres of stick beans planted in May:4 acres of spring cabbage planted in August:1.5 acres of mixed plums for picking in late summer.
